## lowerCase() function

 lowerCase This function return a new string which is the lowercase version of the input string

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function lowerCase(str: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | the input string |

**Returns:**

string
